comment: I took this class Summer 2013. Bartleson is very upfront about this field. She is very open to helping students. Process recording, mock group interview, an actual video/audio recorded video of someone in the HS field, and a final. Read the texts and review the power points! Attend class! That one point could cost you an A.
She is the best professor EVER!!! Whoever made the last comment needed to keep up then she would not have to change assignments and the syllabus.

I had her for my foundation internship class. She was amazing! She was so funny and nice. Very honest too which I liked about her. She is a great professor. I would take her for every class if I could!
Tao is great!  I had her for Overview and made sure I adjusted my schedule to take her for Foundation Internship.  She makes the class so interesting!
Tao's the best.  If I could take her for all of my classes I would!  Very helpful, approachable,and honest! promote her!

Tao is awesome! She is one of my favorite professors! Class was always interesting, even though it was 3 hours long it went by fast! She is very helpful and understanding. It?s not hard to get and A as long as you come to class and pay attention. Allot of the test questions came from activities in class.  Most of the answers were on the power point
